General.Name: Ningbo Sanxing Medical Electric Co Ltd
General.Description: Ningbo Sanxing Medical Electric Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells power distribution and utilization systems in China and internationally. The company offers electricity meters, transformers, box-type substations, switchgear, charging piles, and other power equipment. It also provides financial leasing, factoring, and consulting services, as well as medical services. The company was formerly known as Ningbo Sanxing Electric Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Ningbo Sanxing Medical Electric Co.,Ltd. in October 2015. Ningbo Sanxing Medical Electric Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1986 and is based in Ningbo, China.
General.Address: Ningbo Yinzhou Industrial Park, Ningbo, China, 315191
